FRIEND_OFFLINE.description: Message shown when trying to get access from a friend who is offline.

SEND_CONNECTION_LINK.message: Чтобы поделиться вашим соединением, пожалуйста попросите вашего друга переслать вам их ссылку.
SEND_CONNECTION_LINK.description: Instructions for the user to share their connection with a one-time link.

ONE_TIME_SHARING.description: The user is sharing their Internet access with a friend.

REQUESTING_ACCESS_NOTIFICATION.description: Notification for when a friend sends a request to access the Internet through the user.

CHANGE_STATS_CHOICE.message: Вы можете помочь улучшить качество uProxy согласием делиться статистикой анонимно. Все данные анонимизируются клиентом и пересылаются в надежности.
CHANGE_STATS_CHOICE.description: Informs the user that they can opt in and out of sending anonymous statistics at any time they choose, from the Settings menu.

SHARING_ACCESS_WITH_TWO.description: Message in a status bar that is visible when two friends are getting access through the user.

EMAIL_INSTEAD_MESSAGE.message: Не удалось послать ваш отзыв на uproxy.org. Пожалуйста скопируйте и вставьте ваш отзыв в письмо на адрес info@uproxy.org.
EMAIL_INSTEAD_MESSAGE.description: Seen if feedback submission through uProxy fails. Message asks users to email their feedback instead.

WE_WONT_POST.message: Мы не будем делиться вашими данными или публиковать в социальные сети без вашего согласия
WE_WONT_POST.description: Inform the user that uProxy does not share data or post to their social network accounts without agreement from the user.

IM_IN.description: Agree to submitting anonymous metrics to uProxy.

STOP_ONE_TIME_INSTRUCTION.message: Чтобы остановить получение доступа, нажмите нижеприведённую ссылку

EMAIL_INSTEAD_TITLE.message: Отослать отзыв по электронной почте взамен?
EMAIL_INSTEAD_TITLE.description: Title for error that appears if feedback submission failed.

SELECT_LANGUAGE.description: Instruction to select language used by the application.

GET_HELP.description: Get help from the frequently asked questions page.

SUBMIT_FEEDBACK_SENTENCE_CASE.description: Submit feedback to the uProxy team.

GET_ONE_TIME_INSTEAD_INSTRUCTION.message: Если вы хотели бы начать с кем-то одноразовое соединение, нажмите кнопку "Назад ", а затем "Начать одноразовое подключение", чтобы начать новый сеанс.
GET_ONE_TIME_INSTEAD_INSTRUCTION.description: Instructions for the user if they want to abort an existing attempt and start a new one-time connection.

ERROR_PARSING_LINK.message: Произошла ошибка при чтении ссылки соединения uProxy. Попробуйте нажать на ссылку ещё раз или попросите новую ссылку у вашего друга.
ERROR_PARSING_LINK.description: Error shown if a one-time connection link did not work.

FEEDBACK_TITLE.description: Label for textbox for user's to submit feedback and comments to uProxy.

HOW_TO_OFFER_ONE_TIME.message: Если вы хотели предоставить им доступ, скопируйте и предоставьте нижеследующую ссылку.
HOW_TO_OFFER_ONE_TIME.description: Instructions for user if they'd like to share their Internet connection with a one-time link.

LOADING_FRIENDS.description: User's friends are being loaded from a social network.

ACCEPT_OFFER.description: Accept a friend's offer that would allow the user to access the Internet through their friend.

SHARING_ACCESS_WITH_ONE.description: Message in a status bar that is visible when one friend is getting access through the user.

STATS_ENABLED_MESSAGE.message: Этот значок означает что вы согласились делиться анонимной статистикой с uProxy. Нажмите сюда чтобы поправить настройки.
STATS_ENABLED_MESSAGE.description: Text that appears in a popup explaining the 'anonymous stats enabled' icon.

REQUESTS.description: Title for the group of friends who have sent requests to access the user's Internet, which the user have not yet granted.

START_GETTING.description: Start accessing the Internet through a friend's connection.

STOP_GETTING.description: Stop accessing the Internet through a friend's connection.

ADVANCED_SETTINGS_SENTENCE_CASE.description: Title for the advanced settings screen.

ENABLE_METRICS.description: Asks the user if they want to send anonymous metrics about their uProxy usage.

TRYING_TO_SHARE_ONE_TIME.message: В настоящий момент вы пытаетесь разделить ваш доступ. Если же вы хотели запросить доступ взамен то нажмите ссылку сверху.
TRYING_TO_SHARE_ONE_TIME.description: Instructions for user if they want to get access instead, while attempting to share access.

UNLIKELY.description: Meaning very low probability. Used in context of the probability that network settings are preventing a uProxy connection from being established. Used in analysisResults string.

ALPHA_MESSAGE.message: Это альфа-релиз uProxy и в настоящее время может время от времени ненадежно работать.
ALPHA_MESSAGE.description: Text in a popup that appears wen the user first uses uProxy. Explains that the current version of uProxy is an early, unfinished release, and anonymous statistics (from the user, if they choose) can help with uProxy's development.

POSSIBLY.description: Meaning medium probability. Used in context of the probability that network settings are preventing a uProxy connection from being established. Used in analysisResults string.

FRIEND_REQUESTS_ACCESS.description: A friend has requested to access the Internet through the user.

GET_ONE_TIME_INSTEAD.description: Label for a link to the 'Start a one-time connection' page.

SET_UP_ONE_TIME.description: Clickable link on the login page. As an alternative to logging in to a social network, user's can attempt a connection with a one-time link.

FRIEND_REQUESTED_ONE_TIME.message: Ваш друг (подруга) запросил(а) получить от вас одноразовое соединение.
FRIEND_REQUESTED_ONE_TIME.description: A friend has requested to access the Internet through the user.

ARE_YOU_SURE.description: Question confirming if the user wants to end an active connection to a friend.

ACCEPTED_OFFER_NOTIFICATION.description: Notification for when a friend has accepted the user's offer to share their Internet with that friend.

SHARING_UNAVAILABLE_TITLE.description: Title for error that appears when the user can not share their Internet access with friends.

LEARN_MORE_UPROXY.description: Label for button that brings user to more information about uProxy.

START_ONE_TIME_INSTRUCTION.message: Чтобы начать получать доступ от вашего друга, нажмите нижеприведённую кнопку.

NO_FRIENDS_ONLINE.message: Никого из друзей нет в сети.
NO_FRIENDS_ONLINE.description: None of the user's friends are currently signed in.

CONTINUE_BROWSING.description: Label for button that will change the users Internet settings back to using the user's local connection (i.e. not their friend's Internet).

GRANTED_ACCESS_NOTIFICATION.description: Notification for when a user's request to access the Internet through a friend has been accepted by that friend.

ASK_TO_ANALYZE.message: Возможно что вид NAT вашей сети несовместим с uProxy. Хотите чтобы uProxy проанализировал вашу сеть?
ASK_TO_ANALYZE.description: Text in a popup that appears when an attempt to access the Internet through a friend fails.

SHARE_ONE_TIME.description: Share access to the user's Internet using a link that will only work once.

ASK_TO_SUBMIT_ANALYSIS.message: Хотите предоставить информацию про свой тип NAT команде uProxy, чтобы помочь нам лучше понять сети на которых находятся наши пользователи?
ASK_TO_SUBMIT_ANALYSIS.description: Asks the user if they are willing to share their network analysis results with uProxy, to help the development of uProxy.

GET_ACCESS.description: Text for the tab on the toolbar. When the user is on the 'Get Access' tab, they are looking to get access to the Internet through a friend.

RETRIEVING_LOGS.message: Получение журнала и анализ вашей сети...
RETRIEVING_LOGS.description: Message shown while uProxy is analyzing the user's network settings.

LEARN_MORE_SOCIAL.description: Label for button that brings user to more information about why social networks are used for uProxy.

WAITING_FOR_ACCESS.message: Вы сможете получить доступ когда __name__ одобрит ваш запрос.
WAITING_FOR_ACCESS.description: User will be able to access the Internet through their friend, once that friend gives the user permission.

CONNECTED_WITH.description: Text in settings that informs the user which social network they're connected to.

REQUEST_ONE_TIME.description: Request access to the user's friend's Internet using a link that will only work once.

CONNECT.description: User clicks this to connect to a network

CLOSE.description: Button label to close a popup.

DEVICE_DESCRIPTION.description: Title for the section in Settings where the user can edit the name of their device.

EDIT_ADVANCED_SETTINGS.description: Instruction for the user to edit their advanced settings (by typing JSON in a textbox).

REVOKE_ACCESS.description: Label for button that takes back an offer to a friend who has already accepted that offer. If the button is clicked, the friend will no longer be able to connect to the Internet through the user.

UNABLE_TO_GET_FROM.description: Error message seen in uProxy when the user failed to get access to the Internet through a friend.

FRIENDS_WHO_CAN_GET.message: Друзья которым разрешено получать от вас доступ
FRIENDS_WHO_CAN_GET.description: Title for the group of friends who can access the Internet through the user.

SUBMIT_FEEDBACK.description: Submit feedback to the uProxy team.

ASKING_FOR_ACCESS.description: The user is asking for permission to access the Internet through their friend; user is waiting for the friend's reply.

ANALYZING_NETWORK.description: Message shown when the user's network is being analyzed.

STOP_ONE_TIME_GETTING_BEFORE_NEW.message: Если вы хотите открыть новое единовременное соединение, нажмите сначала "Остановить получение доступа".
STOP_ONE_TIME_GETTING_BEFORE_NEW.description: Instruction for the user to stop a current one-time connection if they want to start a new one.

MORE_INFO.description: Link to 'Does uProxy log data about me?' question in the FAQ.

STOP_IGNORING_OFFERS.description: Button label for if the user wants to stop ignoring offers.

ERROR_SIGNING_IN.message: Ошибка входа в __network__. Пожалуйста попробуйте повторно.
ERROR_SIGNING_IN.description: Notification for when the user could not be signed in to a social network.

UNABLE_TO_GET.description: Title for popup that appears when an attempt to access the Internet through a friend fails.

SHARING_ENABLED_MESSAGE.message: Этот значок означает, что вы доступны для соединения друзьям которым вы предлагали доступ.
SHARING_ENABLED_MESSAGE.description: Text in a popup that explains what the sharing icon (on the toolbar) is.

STOP_ONE_TIME_SHARING_BEFORE_NEW.message: Если вы хотите открыть новое единовременное соединение, нажмите сначала "Остановить получение доступа".
STOP_ONE_TIME_SHARING_BEFORE_NEW.description: Instruction for the user to stop a current one-time connection if they want to start a new one.

IGNORE.description: Button label that ignores an offer or request.

LOGS_TITLE.description: Title for the page that displays a user's network information and uProxy logs.

FRIEND_REQUESTED_ACCESS.description: A friend has requested to access the Internet through the user.

GO_BACK.description: Go back to the main page from the one-time connection page.

ACCESS_NOT_GRANTED.description: The user has not permissioned a friend to access the Internet through the user.

NETWORK_AND_LOGS.message: Проанализировать сеть и включить передачу журнала
NETWORK_AND_LOGS.description: Label for a checkbox that indicates if the user wants uProxy to analyze their network settings and include their uProxy logs with their feedback to the uProxy team.

WELCOME_MESSAGE.message: uProxy позволяет получить доступ от ваших друзей, делиться с ними доступом, или оба варианта одновременно! Для начала, выберите "Получить доступ" или "Поделиться доступом."
WELCOME_MESSAGE.description: Text in a popup that appears when the user first uses uProxy. Explains that the user needs to choose either the Get or Share tab appropriately.

NO_THANKS.description: Do not agree to submitting anonymous metrics to uProxy.

FRIENDS_WHO_SHARE.message: Друзья от которых вы можете получить доступ
FRIENDS_WHO_SHARE.description: Title for the group of friends who the user can get Internet access from.

UNABLE_TO_SHARE_WITH.message: __name__ не смог(ла) получить от вас доступ
UNABLE_TO_SHARE_WITH.description: Error message seen in uProxy when a friend failed to get access to the Internet through the user.

SETTINGS_JSON_ERROR.description: Error shown to the user if their input for advanced settings is incomplete or incompatible with expected settings configurations.

OFFER_ACCESS.description: Label for button that will offer a friend access to the Internet through the user, even though the friend has not requested access.

NEXT.description: Label for button that proceeds from the introduction page to the login page.

SHARING_UNAVAILABLE_MESSAGE.message: Вы используете 37 версию Firefox, которая содержит ошибку препятствующую обмену доступом (см git.io/vf5x1). Эта ошибка исправлена в Firefox 38, так что вы можете включить совместное пользование доступом в интернет после обновления Firefox или после переключения на Chrome.
SHARING_UNAVAILABLE_MESSAGE.description: Text for error that appears when the user can not share their Internet access with friends.

ANALYSIS_RESULTS.message: Похоже, что вы находитесь в сети типа __natType__, которая __natImpact__ на возможность подключения к друзьям.
ANALYSIS_RESULTS.description: A summary of the user's network analysis.

SHARING_ENABLED_TITLE.description: Title for popup that points to the sharing icon in uProxy's top toolbar. The popup appears when the user first grants access to one of their friends. The sharing icon is visible as long as there are friends who can get access to the user's Internet.

START_NEW_CONNECTION.description: Label for button that takes user back to the 'Start a one-time connection' page.

APP_MISSING_TITLE.description: Shown in Chrome if the user has not finished installing both parts of uProxy.

CANCEL_REQUEST.description: Label for button which will take back a request to get Internet access through a friend.

SHARING_ACCESS_WITH_MANY.message: __name__ и ещё __numOthers__ получают интернет доступ через вас
SHARING_ACCESS_WITH_MANY.description: Message in a status bar that is visible when three or more friends are getting access through the user.

CANNOT_OPEN_ONE_TIME_TITLE.description: Title for an error popup that appears if the user tries to open a one-time link while signed in to a social network.

LOGGED_OUT.description: Notification for when the user has been logged out of the social network.

START_ONE_TIME.description: Start an Internet connection using a link that will only work once.

STOPPED_PROXYING.description: Notification for when a friend has stopped accessing the Internet through the user.

DISCONNECTED_TITLE.description: Title for error that appears when the user was getting access to the Internet through their friend, but that connection was terminated.

CONNECTED_WITH_NUMBER.description: Text in settings informing the user of how many networks they're connected to.

ATTEMPTING_RECONNECT.description: uProxy was disconnected from the social network and is trying to reconnect.

WHICH_SOCIAL_NETWORK.message: Где быстрее всего найти ваши контакты?
WHICH_SOCIAL_NETWORK.description: Question seen at the top of uProxy's login page. Asks which social network should be used to find the user's friends.

TRYING_TO_CONNECT.description: The user is trying to connect to the Internet through their friend.

SAVE.description: Label for button that saves the user's text input.

OFFERED_YOU_ACCESS.description: A friend has offered their Internet access to the user.

SHARING_ENABLED_TOOLTIP.description: Text that appears in a tooltip when the user hovers over the sharing icon.

SHARE_ACCESS.description: Text for the tab on the toolbar. When the user is on the 'Share Access' tab, they are looking to share access to their Internet with a friend.

DISCONNECT.description: User clicks this to disconnect from a network

UNABLE_TO_SHARE.description: Title for popup that appears when an attempt to share the Internet with a friend fails.

DISCONNECTED_MESSAGE.message: Если вы отключите прокси-сервер (uProxy), веб-трафик не будет направляться через вашего друга. Прежде чем продолжить, постарайтесь закрыть все чувствительные страницы которые у вас открыты.
DISCONNECTED_MESSAGE.description: Instruction informing the user that to continue browsing the Internet, the user will need to use their local (potentially unsafe and/or censored) connection.

WHY_SOCIAL_NETWORK.message: uProxy использует социальные сети чтобы утанавливать соединения через (для) ваших друзей
WHY_SOCIAL_NETWORK.description: Explains why uProxy needs social networks. (Friends need to login with the same social network on uProxy for friends to see each other.)

TO_SEND_LOGS.message: Чтобы переслать ваш журнал пользования команде uProxy, откройте uProxy и нажмите 'Оставить Отзыв'
TO_SEND_LOGS.description: Instructions guiding the user through how to submit their logs to uProxy.

CANCEL.description: Button label that rejects a proposed action.

ABOUT_UPROXY.message: uProxy помогает вам делиться вашим доступом в интернет с друзьями или получать доступ от друзей.
ABOUT_UPROXY.description: Description on uProxy's introduction screen explaining what uProxy is.

EDIT_ADVANCED_SETTINGS_PLACEHOLDER.description: Default text in the advanced settings textbox.

STATS_ENABLED_TOOLTIP.description: Text that appears in a tooltip when the user hovers over the 'anonymous stats enabled' icon.

DESCRIPTION_DEFAULT.description: If a friend has more than one computer, the computers are given this default name (with increasing numbers) to differentiate them.

FRIEND_NEEDS_TO_CLICK.message: После того как ваш друг открыл ссылку, они отправят ссылку вам в ответ. Нажмите на ссылку или вставьте ее ниже.
FRIEND_NEEDS_TO_CLICK.description: Instructions telling the user that starting a one-time connection is waiting for action from their friend.

OFFERS.description: Title for the group of friends who have sent offers of access to their Internet, which the user have not yet accepted.

DONE.description: Button label that suggests acknowledgement and that closes a popup.

EXT_MISSING_MESSAGE.message: Загрузите и включите uProxy часть 1 чтобы начать пользование программой.
EXT_MISSING_MESSAGE.description: Shown in Chrome to instruct the user to install part 1 of uProxy.

CANCEL_OFFER.description: Label for button that takes back an offer to a friend who has not yet accepted that offer. If the button is clicked, the friend will no longer be able to connect to the Internet through the user.

COPY_CONNECTION_LINK.message: Чтобы послать запрос вашему другу скопируйте данную ссылку и перешлите её по надежному каналу связи.
COPY_CONNECTION_LINK.description: Instructions for the user to request access from a friend with a one-time link.

LOADING.description: Message show when something is taking time to load.

ASK_FOR_ACCESS.description: Button label that sends a request to the user's friend, asking if the user can access the Internet through them.

GRANTED_YOU_ACCESS.description: The user's friend has allowed the user to use the friend's Internet connection.

CANT_OPEN_ONE_TIME_MESSAGE.message: Невозможно открыть соединение вручную одновременно находясь в социальной сети. Для запуска соединения вручную, пожалуйста, авторизуйтесь через меню настроек и повторно вставьте ссылку.
CANT_OPEN_ONE_TIME_MESSAGE.description: Text for an error popup that appears if the user tries to open a one-time link while signed in to a social network.

EXT_MISSING_TITLE.description: Shown in Chrome if the user has not finished installing both parts of uProxy.

ONE_TIME_SUCCESS.description: Inform the user that a one-time connection was successfully established.

ONE_TIME_GETTING.message: В настоящий момент вы получаете доступ.
ONE_TIME_GETTING.description: The user is connected to the Internet through their friend.

SET.description: Label for button that saves the user's advanced settings.

GETTING_ACCESS_FROM.description: Message in a status bar that is visible when the user is getting access from a friend.

STARTED_PROXYING.description: Notification for when a friend has started accessing the Internet through the user.

FRIENDS_APPEAR_WHEN.message: Друзья появляются, когда они используют uProxy и вошли в те же сети где вы находитесь.
FRIENDS_APPEAR_WHEN.description: Instruction informing the user how to invite their friends to uProxy.

VERY_LIKELY.description: Meaning high probability. Used in context of the probability that network settings are preventing a uProxy connection from being established. Used in analysisResults string.

STATS_ENABLED_TITLE.description: The user has elected to submit anonymous statistics about their uProxy usage to the uProxy team.

APP_MISSING_MESSAGE.message: Для начала, загрузите и запустите часть 2 от uProxy.
APP_MISSING_MESSAGE.description: Shown in Chrome to instruct the user to install part 2 of uProxy.

UPROXY_FRIENDS.description: Title for the group of friends who have uProxy but who don't fit into any of the other contact groups.

STOP_IGNORING_REQUESTS.description: Button label for if the user wants to stop ignoring requests.

STOP_ONE_TIME_SHARING.description: Label for button to terminate your connection to a friend who is accessing the Internet through you.

SETTINGS_BAD_FORMAT_ERROR.description: Error shown to the user if their input for advanced settings is badly formed JSON.

P_I_I_MESSAGE.message: Ваши отзывы и адрес электронной почты будут отправлены uProxy.org. Ваш журнал, информация сети и адрес электронной почты может включать в себя персональную информацию.
P_I_I_MESSAGE.description: Message helping make sure the user understands that personally identifiable information may be included in their feedback to uProxy.

SETTINGS_SAVED.description: Message that confirms to the user that their advanced settings were saved.

GRANTED_FRIEND_ACCESS.message: Вы одобрили доступ для вашего друга.
GRANTED_FRIEND_ACCESS.description: The user has agreed to let their friend access the Internet through the user.

OFFERED_ACCESS_NOTIFICATION.description: Notification for when the user receives an offer from a friend to access the Internet through them.

GRANT.description: Label for button that accepts a friend's request to access the Internet through the user.

NO_LONGER_GETTING.message: Вы больше не получаете доступ. Чтобы запросить новое соединение нажмите нижеприведённую кнопку
NO_LONGER_GETTING.description: Message shown when a one-time connection ends.

NAME_THIS_DEVICE.description: If the user has not named their device (e.g. 'laptop' or 'home computer'), they will see this message in the Settings panel.

FEEDBACK_PLACEHOLDER.description: The default text that appears in the user feedback textbox.

CONNECTED_ACCOUNTS.description: In settings, title for the social networks you can connect to.

DESCRIPTION.description: Placeholder for the input field for the name of the user's device.

ADVANCED_SETTINGS.description: Clickable text from the Settings menu. Clicking this opens the advanced settings screen.

ERROR_STARTING_CONNECTION.message: Произошла ошибка при запуске соединения и оно было прекращено. Пожалуйста, попробуйте начать другое соединение.
ERROR_STARTING_CONNECTION.description: Error shown if a one-time connection failed to start.

HOW_TO_INVITE_FRIENDS.description: Question above network select dropdown on invite screen
HOW_TO_INVITE_FRIENDS.message: Как бы вы хотели пригласить ваших друзей?

INVITE_A_FRIEND.description: Title for screen where user invites a friend to uProxy

FACEBOOK_INVITE_INSTRUCTIONS.message: Нажмите нижеприведённую кнопку чтобы послать uProxy приглашение вашим друзьям из Facebook.  Как только они откроют ссылку в uProxy, они появятся в uProxy контактах.

FACEBOOK_INVITE_IN_BROWSER.description: Dialog message instructing user to complete Facebook invitation in their browser

GMAIL_INVITE_INSTRUCTIONS.message: Введите адрес электронной почты вашего друга.  Как только они примут ваше приглашение, они появятся у вас в контактах.

GITHUB_INVITE_INSTRUCTIONS.message: Введите GitHub логин вашего друга. Вы увидите их в своих контактах когда они примут ваш запрос.

GITHUB_INVITE_PLACEHOLDER.description: Placeholder in input box for the GitHub username of the friend the user is inviting

SEND_INVITATION.description: Button text to initiate sending an invitation

INVITE_SENT_CONFIRMATION.description: Dialog text to confirm that an invite was sent to the user's friend

SENDING_FEEDBACK.description: Message in dialog indicating feedback is being sent to the uProxy team.

ONLINE.description: Shown under your contact's who are online

OFFLINE.description: Shown under your contact's who are offline

RESPOND_TO_FRIEND_REQUEST.description: Shown in roster under contacts who have requested to be the user's uProxy friend.

FRIEND_REQUEST_SENT.description: Shown in roster under contacts who the user has requested to be a uProxy friend.

FRIEND_REQUEST.description: Message above button for user to accept a uProxy friend request
FRIEND_REQUEST.message: Ваш друг __name__ хочет пользоваться с вами uProxy!

ACCEPT_INVITE.description: Text for button for user to accept a uProxy friend request

NO_LONGER_SHARING.description: Message shown when a one-time connection ends and the user was sharing.
NO_LONGER_SHARING.message: Вы больше не делитесь доступом. Нажмите кнопку приведённую ниже, чтобы запросить соединение или нажмите кнопку чтобы запросить соединение или вставьте ссылку о запросе от друга чтобы поделиться доступом заново.

ONE_TIME_SHARING_SUCCESS.description: Inform the user that they are now successfully sharing access through a one-time connection
ONE_TIME_SHARING_SUCCESS.message: Сейчас вы делитесь вашим доступом с другом.

ONE_TIME_SHARING_STOP_DIRECTIONS.description: Directions for how to stop sharing access; should refer to the act of clicking the button below which should also have a fairly obvious label.
ONE_TIME_SHARING_STOP_DIRECTIONS.message: Чтобы приостановить разделение доступа, нажмите кнопку приведённую ниже.

ONE_TIME_GETTING_SUCCESS.description: Inform the user that they have now successfully set up a connection through which they can get access.  This message should in no way imply that they are actually getting access (there will be another message prompting them to start using the connection).

ONE_TIME_LINK_INPUT_DESCRIPTION.description: Text (appearing within the input box) informing the user that they can paste the one-time connection link they get back from their friend here.  It should be clear that it is the link from the friend and not the link they just copied above.

ONE_TIME_LINK_INPUT_ERROR.description: Error message to show the user if they paste a poorly-formatted link into a texbox.  Should prompt them to try pasting the link again.
ONE_TIME_LINK_INPUT_ERROR.message: Не узнаем ссылку. Проверьте на правильность и попробуйте ещё раз

SUBMIT_ONE_TIME_LINK.description: Text for a button the user may click after pasting in a (probably valid) one-time connection link into a textbox above the button.

CONNECT_TO_FRIEND.description: Title above instructions that tell the user how to add a uProxy friend.

CONNECT_TO_FRIEND_MESSAGE.description: Instructions that appears beside a big '+' button. Clicking the button opens a panel with options to add a uProxy friend.
CONNECT_TO_FRIEND_MESSAGE.message: Используйте эту кнопку чтобы послать приглашение другу или вставьте взамен ссылку.

GETTING_ACCESS_FROM_FRIEND.description: Message in a status bar that is visible when the user is getting access from a nameless friend

SHARING_ACCESS_WITH_FRIEND.description: Message in a status bar that is visible when the user is sharing access with a nameless friend

RECONNECTING.description: Indicate that uProxy is attempting to reconnect automatically after a failure.  A progress indicator is also visible.

RECONNECT_FAILED.description: Indicate that uProxy attempted to reconnect automatically but it failed.

RESTART_PROXYING.description: Displayed on a button next to the RECONNECT_FAILED message

UPDATE_AVAILABLE.description: What to show the user (on the bottom bar) when an update is available.  The actual update will not be done until they restart uProxy which we will prompt them to do with a link.

RESTART_UPROXY_UPDATE.description: A link the user can click on to restart uProxy and permorm an update

PORT_CONTROL_TITLE.description: Title for the port control section in advanced settings

PORT_CONTROL_SUPPORTED.description: NAT-PMP, PCP, or UPnP is supported in the router

PORT_CONTROL_NOT_SUPPORTED.description: NAT-PMP, PCP, and UPnP are not supported in the router
PORT_CONTROL_NOT_SUPPORTED.message: Ваш раутер не поддерживает порт контроль.

PORT_CONTROL_PENDING.description: uProxy is currently probing router for port control support
PORT_CONTROL_PENDING.message: Определяем поддерживает ли ваш раутер порт контроль...

PORT_CONTROL_NOT_SUPPORTED_INFO.description: Extra information displayed when port control is not supported
PORT_CONTROL_NOT_SUPPORTED_INFO.message: Вы можете включить контроль портов чтобы сделать uProxy более надежным.

PORT_CONTROL_NOT_SUPPORTED_INFO_LINK.description: Link text right after the PORT_CONTROL_NOT_SUPPORTED_INFO text

LEARN_MORE.description: Generic label for links to FAQ.

FRIEND_ADDED.description: Confirmation message after adding a friend to the roster.

FRIEND_ADD_ERROR.description: Error message when a friend cannot be added to the roster.
FRIEND_ADD_ERROR.message: Произошла ошибка при добавлении вашего контакта.

INVITE_EMAIL_SENT.description: Confirmation message after an invite email has been sent

ENTER_INVITATION.description: Title for screen where user enters an invitation

ENTER_INVITATION_DESCRIPTION.description: Instructions for user to enter an invitation
ENTER_INVITATION_DESCRIPTION.message: Если вы получили приглашение от контакта с которым вы хотите пользоваться uProxy with, вставьте его здесь:

SUBMIT_BUTTON_TEXT.description: Button that submits some data entered by the user, e.g. entering a friend invite

INVITE_LINK_FROM_ACCEPT_PAGE.description: Link to send an invite if the user is already on the accept-invite page.
INVITE_LINK_FROM_ACCEPT_PAGE.message: Я бы хотел(а) послать приглашение взамен.

GITHUB_INVITE_SEND_FAILED.description: Dialog text informing user that a GitHub friend request failed.
GITHUB_INVITE_SEND_FAILED.message: Вы только можете добавить друзей которые уже авторизовались в uProxy с GitHub аккаунтом.

ACCEPT_LINK_FROM_INVITE_PAGE.description: Link to accept an invite if the user is already on the send an invite page
ACCEPT_LINK_FROM_INVITE_PAGE.message: Я бы хотел(а) принять приглашение взамен.

ACCEPT_INVITE_CONFIRMATION.description: Confirmation message when accepting an invite.

LOGIN_REQUIRED_TITLE.description: Title for confirmation that the user must login to a network to accept an invitation

LOGIN_REQUIRED_MESSAGE.description: Message for confirmation that the user must login to a network to accept an invitation
LOGIN_REQUIRED_MESSAGE.message: чтобы принять приглашение которое вам послал(а) __name__, вам нужно соединиться в uProxy по сети __network__.  Нажмите "Да" чтобы продолжить.

INVITE_URL_ERROR.description: Error message shown for invalid invite URLs

INVITE_EMAIL_SUBJECT.description: Default email subject for sending an uProxy invite

INVITE_EMAIL_BODY.description: Default email body for sending an uProxy invite
INVITE_EMAIL_BODY.message:
__name__ приглашает вас в uProxy. Нажмите на нижеприведённую ссылку или вставьте в uProxy.

__url__

Если у вас не установлено uProxy, вы можете загрузить на uproxy.org или прямиком из Chrome веб-магазина (часть 1 и часть 2) и торговая площадка Firefox (Здесь).

GOOGLE_AND_FACEBOOK_CHANGED_NOTIFICATION.message:
Мы сделали большие изменения в работе uProxy с социальными сетями!

  • Мы добавили новую сеть Gmail которая разрешает вам соединиться с любым у кого есть Gmail аккаунт. Используйте кнопку а правом нижнем углу конткактного листа чтобы послать приглашение.
  • The "Google" network is now called Google Hangouts. Because Google is removing technology we rely on, our support for this network will be removed.
  • Facebook contacts are now added by invitation. You can invite friends using the button at the lower right of the contact list, and only friends you've invited will be able to tell you're using uProxy. To make this change, we've had to reset your friend list, so you'll have to invite friends you want to connect to.

Пожалуйста оставляйте отзыв насчёт этих новых изменений используя ссылку в меню или послав письмо по адресу info@uProxy.org
